column1: '''''The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1973''''' was the first official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1972]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', two maps by [[Pauline Baynes]], and a photograph of Tolkien by John Wyatt.

column2: There and Back Again: A Map of Bilbo's Journey through Eriador and Rhovanion]]" by [[Pauline Baynes]]
